questions.question: The Finches helped Darwin figure out the theory of natural selection because;

choices.answer: He went on a tropical vacation to find them-very relaxing.
He let the finches live in his beard.
Darwin knew how to speak to Finches.
He realized their beaks were adapted to their environments

questions.question: Finches' beaks had adapted to different environments to;

choices.answer: Help them eat different types of available food
help them eat only elastic bands and paperclips.
Make them more cute.
Help them breathe under water.

questions.question: The peppered moth evolved within a few generations because;

choices.answer: Environmental changes made white moths easier prey for birds
Black moths were stronger and could fight off other moths.
White moths are THE WORST.
Something about the industrial revolution?¯\_(ツ)_/¯

questions.question: Animal body systems, like the digestive system and the nervous system have evolved to be;

choices.answer: Exactly the same in every organism, ever.
Gross! I mean, hello, sponges poop out of their mouths.
Different, depending on the environment of the organism.
Alike, thats why jellyfish are so similar to polar bears.

questions.question: What does descent with modification mean?

choices.answer: Babies are similar to their parents with some differences.
It's random how a baby will look.
Babies never look like their parents.
Baby badgers are always cute.

questions.question: Organisms adapted to their environment will survive and produce more offspring. This is called:

choices.answer: Homologous structures
Genetic drift
Natural Selection
Common descent
